item.title: Remix OS on Chromebook
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: It seems like everyone has been talking about Remix OS lately. If you aren’t up to date, Remix OS is another implementation of the Android x86 poject. The goal of the project is to get Android running on desktops. [adinserter block=”5″] In the video above, I took a brief look at the state of Remix OS. The tl;dr is that it’s well designed and offers a nice stylish edge over the normal stock Android UI.
